attributes.action: Make skilled occupation training available to all the unemployed, not just a specific age group
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make apprenticeships and training available to all, not just a particular age group. Because under the age law no unemployed person should be denied training on the grounds of age, in the way that the Hampshire & Isle of Wight Learning
Skills Council and Basingstoke's Key Training do. Because with the Age Law the age stipulation for apprenticeships is technically illegal.
